one_reviews_text: I cant believe I spent my money on this. You are too low to the ground, you need to move your arms back and forth which sometimes gets tiring,  you constantly need to keep the thumbstick up to stand, and the amount of swinging you need to do just to move some feet is so stupid. WAY too much money for this garbage.
review_feedback: Sorry to hear you had a bad experience! Our customers are important to us, and it's so sad to hear anyone feeling a negative experience. Please reach out to us at contact@chickenwaffle.com for help and support:)

review_title: The only game my 10 and 12 year old play
one_reviews_text: I have a lot of game. But this one is a hit with the kids. The ability to explore, play and find little amusing Easter eggs means this is a hit. Highly recommended for the kids (and parents)
review_feedback: Thanks for the great review! So awesome for the devs to hear people enjoying the game!

one_reviews_text: I love all the hidden achievements and funny parodies! Well done!

I'd like to say that this game is great to mess around with.  Doesn't need much of a story, it's just something to play with.

However, there are a couple of major bugs that I think must be addressed...the stand-up/climb system doesn't seem to work too well with Oculus Touch.  The control scheme for that is kind of awkward.  When I try to climb onto the bed, nothing happens.

The most major bug occurs with the controls themselves.  For some reason, while using the crawl mechanic, if I have to adjust my position in the real world, the vertical position in the game seems to be stuck.  If I stand up to adjust something (say, move my headset cable), when I sit down again, my view shows that I'm UNDERNEATH THE FLOOR.  Ten minutes into the game and I'm reaching up to the ceiling just to see what's at ground level.

I hope they address this problem, I don't like to see programming errors get in the way of a good game (I should know, I've made a few myself, and they frustrate me to no end in testing).
this game is fun and has an amazing potenisil i think anyone would enjoy this game!
i bought this game and when i loaded in, it just didnt work. it froze my whole oculus and computer. i couldnt do anything. dont buy this stupid rip off.
